name: feydar-monorepo
description: FEY Protocol token deployment monitor - Discord bot, webapp, and Farcaster miniapp

scripts.dev: concurrently -n bot,api,webapp -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm --filter bot dev" "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter webapp dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter bot build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter webapp build
